summary: Lithuania, 1977. Memories of childhood, adolescence, and first love in a small provincial town, shown through complexity of human relations at this periodical film.
cast: Regina Arbaciauskaite|Vladas Bagdonas|Stasys Jonynas|Doloresa Kazragyte|Algirdas Latenas|Leonid Obolensky|Elvyra Piskinaite|Saulius Sipaitis|Kostas Smoriginas|Antanas Surna
title: Riesutu duona
